def generate_ca():
    # CA generation code remains the same
    ca_private_key_path = "assets/ca_files/ca_private_key.pem"
    ca_certificate_path = "assets/ca_files/ca_certificate.pem"
    os.makedirs("assets/ca_files", exist_ok=True)
    if os.path.exists(ca_private_key_path) and os.path.exists(ca_certificate_path):
        with open(ca_private_key_path, "rb") as key_file:
            ca_key = serialization.load_pem_private_key(
                key_file.read(),
                password=None,

label: employee_data

employee_data = read_json("assets/employees.json")
df = pd.DataFrame(employee_data)
passwords = []
for employee in employee_data:
    emp_key, emp_cert = generate_employee_cert(ca_key, ca_cert, employee)
    filename = f"{employee['nombres'].replace(' ', '_')}"
    password = generate_password(16)  # Contraseña de 16 caracteres
    passwords.append(password)
    export_p12(emp_cert, emp_key, ca_cert, password, filename)
    print(f"Certificado PKCS#12 para {employee['nombres']} generado")
